channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What To Know About NASCAR Antitrust Lawsuit: Settlement Reached
item.description: Two teams — Michael Jordan's 23XI Racing and Front Row Motorsports — are suing NASCAR alleging a violation of antitrust laws. Here is the latest news ...

item.title: 2025 CFP First-Round Odds: Lines, Spreads for Each Opening Game
item.description: Find out which teams are double-digit favorites and which games could be competitive in the first round of the College Football Playoff.

item.title: Fired Michigan Football Coach Sherrone Moore Spent Night in County Jail
item.description: Former Michigan Wolverines football coach Sherrone Moore was still jailed on Thursday morning, according to court records.

item.title: Michigan Head Coach Candidate Tiers: Which Coaches Would Be a Home Run Hire?
item.description: Who will be the next head coach of Michigan? Joel Klatt has three likely names, and another three names he thinks it should force to say no.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 15: Lines, Spreads for all 16 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 15 matchup.

item.title: For Nebraska's Dani Busboom Kelly, home is where you hang a banner
item.description: Replacing legendary coach and mentor John Cook was just a step on her path to building a legend of her own.

item.title: NHL trade tiers big board: Which players could be on the move this season?
item.description: Here's a way-too-early look at the shocking superstar possibilities, pending free agents and overlooked gems.

item.title: Ten (maybe 11) players to watch at NCAA volleyball tournament's Sweet 16
item.description: Olivia Babcock, Rebekah Allick and Logan Lednicky are among the players to keep an eye on.

item.title: Everything to know from Thunder and Spurs advancing to Las Vegas
item.description: The top moments, highlights and takeaways as the Thunder and Spurs won their respective games to advance to Las Vegas.

item.title: Which NHL player and team trends are for real? The trend-o-meter for all 32
item.description: From Morgan Geekie's scoring rate to the "Wall of St. Paul" and more, here's what will and won't continue.
